title: Sing yourself silly!
brief_description: Big Bird and his friends invite you to have some silly fun with eleven of their favourite silly songs. Sing along with Ernie, Oscar the Grouch, Hoots the Owl and other Sesame Street favourites. Includes a song-lyric poster.
